dictionary.description: Obeying her father's order to flee to safety, Estia followed Xenon's lead and stepped foot outside the kingdom's gates for the very first time. They barely managed to escape the wrath of the gods by taking shelter in a deserted tower, but the chains of destiny bound them to even more misfortune as they soon found themselves trapped under an evil witch's curse.
dictionary.evolution:
I'll acquire the strength to
overcome pain and grief.
I have to!
dictionary.fusion:
I've never worked so hard.
I'll do anything to be less
of a burden on Xenon.
dictionary.summon:
I'm happy to have met you.
You're the second friend I've made!
Don't leave me, okay?
